findings.liver: Minimal signal loss on out of phase imaging consistent with mild fatty deposition; 8 x 7 mm lesion in left lobe consistent with hemangioma; no intra or extrahepatic biliary dilatation; multiple gallstones without evidence of cholecystitis.
findings.pancreas: Normal signal intensity; ductal dilatation absent; multiple cystic structures likely side branch intraductal papillary mucinous neoplasms.
findings.kidneys: Multiple hyperintense lesions on T2 consistent with simple cysts; largest cyst measures 3.6 x 2.8 cm in right kidney; 5 mm cystic lesion in left kidney consistent with small hemorrhagic cyst.
findings.stomach_and_bowel: Unremarkable; no free fluid or lymphadenopathy.
